Pre-Game Insights: Both teams are fighting to stay alive in the Super Four stage of the Asia Cup 2022.
Sri Lanka and Bangladesh have both previously lost to Afghanistan, affecting their form.
The match is crucial for both teams to progress in the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the 5th match of the Asia Cup 2022.
Sri Lanka has a better head-to-head record against Bangladesh (8 wins to 4).
